basics.name: Vivian Chen
basics.label: Web Developer / Interaction Designer
basics.summary: Vivian Chen is a self-taught web developer and a designer. She perseveres in frontend technology with her interests in web animation, data visualization, and interactivity. Coming from a design background, she focuses on not only the functionality and performance of a website but also usability, visual design, and user experience. In the process of product development, she prioritizes communication within the team, between users and stakeholders. Her experiences as a UI/UX designer and her continuous pursuit of user-centered design are her greatest asset as she transitions into the role of developer. She strives to be a bridge that connects people and optimize the product development process

work.name: Xtars Live Media
work.description: A live video streaming app company
work.summary: Vivian worked as the leading UI designer of the product app that endeavers to enrich social engagement between the live streamers and users.
highlights: - Set the entire visual design and started a style guideline for the entire app
- Utilized web development skills to prototype and validate designs and improve communications with the engineering team
- Planned and Designed a brand new homepage that provides user abundant entertaining content and allows the operation and marketing team to utilize the design and run their campaigns

volunteer.summary: This project introduced resources to people who are interested in coding in rural areas.
highlights: - Outlined a design curriculum and guided the student to go through a product design process.
- Designed a web development curriculum that allows the student to make a personal website with basic HTML&CSS

education.institution: Emily Carr University of Art + Design

projects.name: Interactive UI Demos
projects.description: These are some demos that are used to validate the design and used as communication tools to collaborate with the engineers
